title: A $5,000 Per Month Niche for Children's Books on Amazon KDP | Niche Research Session

tactics.name: Keyword Research with Publisher Rocket
tactics.description: Analyze niche keywords using Publisher Rocket to assess market potential and competition
steps: Use Incognito mode for unbiased Amazon search results
Check keyword rankings and sales data
caveats: Rankings may not always load reliably
source_quotes: I'll have a look at the description find out what activities are involved

tactics.name: BSR & Reviews Filter
tactics.description: Filter niches by sales rank and review count to identify viable opportunities
steps: Use KD Spy to search niches
Sort by sales rank and remove outliers
caveats: Avoid niches with high competition colors (red/yellow)
source_quotes: we want an average sales rank of 150,000 or less

tactics.name: Keyword Niche Validation
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to identify high-search, moderate-competition children's book niches
caveats: Competing with established brands like Sesame Street
source_quotes: Amazon searches is very high competitive score is moderate

heuristics.name: Review Count Threshold
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize niches with lower competition
source_quotes: there under 100 searches per month but good monthly uh earnings

heuristics.name: Review Threshold Rule
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize the niche
source_quotes: we want to be competing with books of 150 reviews or 200 reviews or less

heuristics.name: Moderate Competition Boost
heuristics.condition: If competitive score is moderate then boost niche potential

claims.statement: Amazon search results can be influenced by previous search history
source_quotes: it's just important to use Incognito

claims.statement: KDP niches with BSR < 150,000 and reviews < 200 show potential
source_quotes: we want an average sales rank of 150,000 or less

claims.statement: Dental health is an underserved niche in children's books
source_quotes: it's probably an area of Health that tends to be forgotten about but is highly important

niche_patterns.example: children + educational content + long shelf life
niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience needs with durable content
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Avoids seasonal trends by focusing on evergreen themes
source_quotes: you'd rather have a book that has long-term uh capabilities
